version_description: - Bug fixes

+强势回归-PDF SDK底层大翻新
*文档载入与阅读速度提升2倍
*文档读取与书写速度提升2倍
*文档读取与存取稳定度增强-PDF引擎针对大型PDF文档以及部分损坏的作相应修复

+更加直觉的PDF浏览器&注解工具
*全新功能加入-可旋转PDF页面以及选取PDF页面另存新档
*优化PDF注解手势操作以及PDF表格填入改善
*书签可同步保存至PDF文档—允许其他PDF阅读软件读取书签
*加强文字选取功能以及大幅提升Page Editor稳定性<

+ Scanner - import scanned projects without limitation.

We are iOS7 ready! PDF Reader works smoothly and beautifully on iOS7!

+ Compatible with iOS7
+ BRAND NEW interface
+ Support AirDrop – transfer your files in a blink of an eye
+ Enhanced cropping feature in Scanner
+ Flow change for O

In the latest version, PDF Reader is compatible with iOS 8 and optimized for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6+.

iOS 8 Specials
• iCloud Drive – access your files stored in iCloud on the iPhone, iPod Touch, iPad, Mac or PC via iCloud Drive.
• Document Pi

My Markups – refer to “Introduction of My Markups” stored in the file list for How-Tos
•Extract annotations from PDFs and save them to “My markups” folder
•View markup files on a web format via the shareable link
•Support to post shareable links

PDF Reader is compatible with iOS 9 now.

If you like PDF Reader, please take a minute and leave us a great review on the App Store. Your support would greatly help.

This update brings full support for the latest iOS 13 and iPadOS.

PDF Reader integrates with Dark Mode
■ Switch the appearance of PDF Reader to dark mode to read, sign, and edit documents comfortably
■ System light or dark state is matched b

■ Added magnifying glass effect when moving the signature to the correct place on the PDF file
■ Optimized the quality of image signatures
■ Overall stability improvements and bug fixes
